main event: Two gold-white glowing objects were observed in the sky near Dexter, Ohio for about 10 minutes.
interesting points: The objects picked up speed and altitude before going out of sight.
No sound of any kind was heard during the sighting.
The objects were seen on several occasions, always around the same time of day.
Military aircraft were in the area at the time, and the descriptions fit the lighting of aircraft.
The witness had seen similar objects in the past, around 12 times over 2 years.
